To get the value of the indicator, use its Current.Value attribute.

private Variance _var;

// In Initialize()
var symbol = AddEquity("SPY").Symbol;
_var = VAR(symbol, period);

// In OnData()
if (_var.IsReady)
{
    var current = _var.Current.Value;
}
# In Initialize()
symbol = self.AddEquity("SPY").Symbol
self.var = self.VAR(symbol, period)

# In OnData()
if self.var.IsReady:
    current = self.var.Current.Value
